job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>Multiple positions </p><p>Sunnyvale, CA or Austin, TX</p><p>SRE with/Without KAFKA</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Job Description</u></strong></p><p>- SRE Ops - Very good in&nbsp;Unix, Jenkins and Scripting - Groove / shell / python</p><p>- Should be proficient in creating Work Flows in Jenkins and Ansible playbacks</p><p>- Excellent Analytical, Troubleshooting and problem solving skills</p><p>- Very good in DevOps process and troubleshooting Issues</p><p>- Experience in Production Deployment and On-Call Support.&nbsp;</p><p>- Experience in solving problems and working with a team to resolve large scale production issues.</p><p>- Good to have knowledge in Ansible</p>
